mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, password, nickname, email, is_active, signup_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, 1, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, ID AS id, password, nickname, email, signup_date AS signupDate, is_active AS isActive, deleted_date AS deletedDate FROM member WHERE ID = #{id} AND password = #{password} AND is_active = 1
